DOC.brief_title: Differential Effects Clomiphene Citrate Women Undergoing Superovulation
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study identify psychological physical symptom experience woman take clomiphene citrate superovulation prospective setting . Clomiphene citrate commonly use ovulation induction woman anovulation , correction luteal phase deficiency superovulation empiric therapy unexplained infertility1 . While clomiphene citrate generally well tolerate , common side effect report include vasomotor flush , breast tenderness , pelvic discomfort , mood swing . Visual change , palenopsia rarely reported2 . The side effect profile report woman use clomiphene citrate similar symptom premenstrual dysphoric disorder ( PMDD ) . Symptoms PMDD include tension , irritability , depress mood , affective lability , lack energy , difficulty concentrating , physical symptom breast tenderness , bloating , headache joint muscle pain . Several validated scale use record symptom occurrence characterize time symptom occurrence relative menstrual cycle3 . The psychological mood side effect clomiphene citrate woman undergo infertility treatment study limited degree . One study report mood swing 9 14 woman surveyed4 . Another small study find high frequency irritability , mood swing , feel bloat woman undergo fertility treatment take clomiphene citrate compare medication .
DOC.criteria: Menstruating woman , age 2540 , regular menstrual cycle 2335 day length elect treat unexplained infertility use clomiphene citrate superovulation combine intrauterine insemination eligible participation study . Eligible participant identify physician Utah Center Reproductive Medicine University Utah provide write informed consent randomize treatment group . Male partner 's semen analysis must show sperm density least 10 million per ml , motility 20 % great normal morphology use World Health Organization ( WHO ) criterion . Women history depression anxiety disorder require hospitalization treatment last six month woman currently receive treatment previous six month anxiety , depression psychiatric disorder list 4th Edition Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders ( DSMIV ) exclude . Women previously receive treatment clomiphene citrate also exclude study . Women use tobacco illicit drug exclude study participation .
